attributes.background:
Since June 2016 the BBC, Sky, Ch4 and other media and news outlets have promoted anti Brexit reports, news and documentaries and targeted & promoted negative view of Brexit and Leave Supporters. 

And has been bias to Remain, including leading reporters, leading news programs such as question time
